name: iPortalU2net
short_description: An internet-portal app, meant for people that have recently jumped off of the AOL GUI internet bandwagon, and are experiencing the power of the real internet for the first time. It's customizeable for all age groups, and will allow multi-platform use.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: Mozilla Public License 1.1 (MPL 1.1)
